item.title: Video RTC · Mobile SDK
item.description: Photo Source: Interactive Powers. Build easily WebRTC-powered video calling into your mobile app with a simple JavaScript library for our Video RTC communication platforms. With our Video RTC · Mobile SDK, you can easily add real-time video calling over a data connection or WiFi from your website or app. Interactive Powers offers high quality video communication and seamless integration into any existing app. Add Real-Time Communications to your app.
